page.title: 18TOURISM,BEACH SURVEY.
page.content:
{16th July, Treyarnon Bay, 1.30 pm.
People came from as far as Australia. British people from London,Coventry, Bath. 3 out of 4 people wanted dogs banned from beaches because of the mess and because they don't like them. Most people walked to the beach. People come to Treyarnon because it's safe for children,the rocks and sea are pleasant,the surf is good and the sand is fine. Most people come to the beach daily while they are on holiday and have an ice cream once a day.Most people thought that the ice cream cost too much,they think it should be ten - twenty five pence instead of thirty to forty pence. Some people use the beach shop but many don't.
